title: Two intercepted letters from Sr. William Brereton to the Earle of Essex and M. Pym concerning the rebels affaires in the North : the originalls whereof were sent by an expresse to the Earle of Essex according to His Majesties direction this 8. of July, 1643.
author: Brereton, William, Sir, 1604-1661.
publisher: Printed verbatim according to the originalls by Leonard Lichfield ...,
